about_the_game:
A perfect combination of genres

Your goal is to destroy all bricks and enemies. Collect dropped power-ups but make sure not to miss a ball. Swing your hand to hit the ball just like in Air Hockey.

Dodge the bullets or return them to enemies

Enemies are trying to shoot your VR head, which takes the challenge to a new level. Dodge bullets or reflect them into the enemy.

In-game level editor and Workshop

Try out your ideas and upload your own levels to the Steam Workshop. Download levels created by other players. Full VR, no need to leave the game or use a mouse.

Extra Features

  • Advanced boss fights: Some bosses are weak at the back, others can't be hit by the ball, etc. Each boss requires a unique approach to defeat it.
  • Air Hockey: additional game mode with few setups and exciting power-ups.
  • Local multiplayer: compete or team up with your friend. Player-2 will play on the monitor using a mouse.
  • Flexible difficulty: 8 gameplay modifiers and 5 game difficulties are available. Play in your own style.
  • Quick room setup: mega easy to calibrate room. Just hold one button to set direction and table height. Several seconds to do!
  • LIV support and smooth camera for creating a great video content.


Players who try VR for the first time can fully enjoy the game. Because everyone knows how to play Air Hockey :). But the real challenge appears when you have to dodge enemy bullets and collect power ups while tracking the ball.

The game is perfect for those who just want to press the "Play" button and immediately get ton of fun and activity. Personally I really don't like spending time on room calibration. Luckily, in VRNOID you just hold the Thumbstick for a few seconds to adjust the height and direction. Additionally, you can play it while sitting or standing.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (AMD FX 8350) or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: VRNOID is the perfect mix of bricks breaker and Air Hockey in VR. Swing your striker to hit the ball. Destroy bricks and enemies, collect power-ups, and dodge bullets. Prepare yourself for challenging levels and bosses that are waiting for you in this retro arcade game.
